title: Generalized Multi-Protocol Label Switching (GMPLS) Signaling Extensions for G.709 Optical Transport Networks Control
abstract:
This document is a companion to the Generalized Multi-Protocol Label
Switching (GMPLS) signaling documents.  It describes the
technology-specific information needed to extend GMPLS signaling to
control Optical Transport Networks (OTN); it also includes the
so-called pre-OTN developments.  [STANDARDS-TRACK]
